UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Delta-Myrtoxin-Mp1a is a Helical Heterodimer from the Venom of the Jack Jumper Ant that has Antimicrobial, Membrane-Disrupting, and Nociceptive Activities
Literature.Author: Dekan Z, Headey SJ, Scanlon MJ, Baldo BA, Lee T-H, Aguilar M-I, Deuis JR, Vetter I, Elliott AG, Amado M, Cooper MA, Alewood D, Alewood PF

Literature.Title: It Takes Two: Dimerization Is Essential for the Broad-Spectrum Predatory and Defensive Activities of the Venom Peptide Mp1a from the Jack Jumper Ant Myrmecia pilosula
Literature.Author: Nixon SA, Dekan Z, Robinson SD, Guo S, Vetter I, Kotze AC, Alewood PF, King GF, Herzig V

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:50% Killing=>20 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>20 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=6.4-12.8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>=12.8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-2146(MIC=6.4-12.8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=0.2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>12.8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa FADDI-PA070(MIC=>12.8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=0.8-1.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 1(MIC=3.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 17(MIC=1.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus VRSA1(MIC=1.6-3.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus VRSA10(MIC=0.4-0.8µM),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 700677(MIC=0.2-0.4µM),Haemonchus contortus(IC50=46.8±0.6µM),Drosophila melanogaster(LD50=>0.6µM)
